beer.beer_description:
Hops: Taiheke, Motueka & Riwaka.
Appearance: bright, light liquid sunshine.
Aroma: grapefruit, citrus & white grape.
Flavour: hoppy, citrus with a crisp full-bodied finish.
Mouthfeel: deceptively easy drinking.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 465 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 94!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 445 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 90! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 445 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 90!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 330 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 67! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Another local boy in a local brew bar, doesn’t really get any better

user.bio: Living in Wellington spoils me to some fantastic craft brewers and amazing beers. I enjoy sampling new brews from around

items.badge_description: Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 45 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 10.
